mapper.insert: insert into ahs_second_house ( feature, title, village_id, village_name, address, lng, lat, floor, total_floor, covered_type, covered_area, price, user_id, orientations, is_lift, room, hall, cookroom, toilet, gallery, cityid, areaid, streesid, fixture, age, house_desc, owner_mentality, sell_point, house_number, updatetime, status, house_type, contacts, sex, user_type, telephone, sign_name, broker, createtime ) values ( #{feature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{villageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{villageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalFloor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coveredType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coveredArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orientations,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isLift,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{room,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hall,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cookroom,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{toilet,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gallery,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{areaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{streesid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fixture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{houseDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{ownerMentality,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{sellPoint,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{houseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{houseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{broker,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NOW() )
mapper.select: select id, feature, title, village_id, village_name, address, lng, lat, floor, total_floor, covered_type, covered_area, price, user_id, orientations, is_lift, room, hall, cookroom, toilet, gallery, cityid, areaid, streesid, fixture, age, house_desc, owner_mentality, sell_point, house_number, createtime, updatetime, status, house_type, contacts, sex, user_type, telephone, sign_name, broker, house_real, status_content, flag, is_del,is_sale from ahs_second_house where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id,village_name as villageName,feature,cityid as cityId,areaid as areaId,streesid as streesId,price,room,hall,toilet, orientations,house_type as houseType,floor,fixture,title,is_top as houseReal,DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createtime,user_type as userType,is_lift as isLift, covered_area as coveredArea,CONCAT_WS(',',lat,lng) as loc,is_sale as isSale from ahs_second_house where id=#{id}

select (select count(*) from ahs_user_collect where house_id=ahs_second_house.id and collect_type=2) as collect_view, (select count(*) from ahs_user_history where house_id=ahs_second_house.id and history_type=2) as page_view, (select img_url from ahs_second_house_img where second_house= ahs_second_house.id and img_type=1 limit 0,1) as picture, (select nickname from ahs_users where id=ahs_second_house.user_id) as nickname, (select shortname from ahs_area where id=ahs_second_house.areaid) as areaname,(select shortname from ahs_area where id=ahs_second_house.streesid) as streesname from ahs_second_house where id=#{id}

select id,room,hall,toilet,price,covered_area,orientations,fixture,house_desc,house_real,house_type,is_lift,title,feature,village_name,address,DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d') as createtime,house_number, (select shortname from ahs_area where id=ahs_second_house.areaid) as areaname,(select shortname from ahs_area where id=ahs_second_house.streesid) as streesname,lat,lng,floor,total_floor,user_id,flag,is_sale, (select im_account from ahs_users where id=ahs_second_house.user_id) as im_account, (select nickname from ahs_users where id=ahs_second_house.user_id) as nickname, (select userphoto from ahs_users where id=ahs_second_house.user_id) as userphoto, (select img_url from ahs_second_house_img where second_house=ahs_second_house.id and img_type=1 limit 0,1) as img_url, (select count(*) from ahs_second_house_img where second_house=ahs_second_house.id and img_type=1 ) as img_count from ahs_second_house where id=#{id} and is_del=0

select id,room,hall,toilet,price,covered_area,title,floor,total_floor,(select img_url from ahs_second_house_img where second_house=ahs_second_house.id and img_type=1 limit 0,1) as img_url ,flag,status,DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as createtime from ahs_second_house where user_id=#{userId} and is_del=0 order by createtime desc
